Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 69th Street/Halsted
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 69th, Halsted, 71st, Wentworth, & 69th, due to street blockage near 69th Street/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 69th, Halsted, 71st, Wentworth, & 69th, due to street blockage near 69th Street/Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #73 Armitage Temporary Westbound Reroute near Cortland/Southport
